name: Home made Organic Aloe Vera Lip Balm
description:
Hello everyone ♥ 

This is a home made, Organic lip balm made my myself using a blend of Organic oils and butters :)

This lip balm flavour was extracted from my very own Aloe Vera plant from Mauritius. It is made from six simple ingredients which are:

Aloe Vera
Virgin Organic Coconut Oil
Organic Apricot Kernal Oil
Organic Fairtrade Shea Butter,
Organic Yellow Beeswax
Organic Cocoa Butter
 
None of my lip balms have been tested on animals and are suitable for vegans/vegetarians.

I am legally allowed to sell my cosmetics as I received my licence to do so on the 22/06/2012

The packaging can even be re-cycled for those who care about the environment and I can take orders via email (anita_papita@hotmail.co.uk) but feel free to contact me through my group on Facebook called Mlle Nina if it's more convenient and to get regular updates:

http://www.facebook.com/MlleNina6

Please expect your order to come in 3-5 business days and if you'd like a lip balm menu which has all of my lip balm flavours on it please feel free to contact me via email.

All of my products are made with love so enjoy your purchase and let me know if you think there's any room for improvement (:

name: Home made Organic Strawberry Lip Balm
description:
Hello everyone ♥ 

This is a home made, Organic lip balm made my myself using a blend of Organic oils and butters :)

This is my Strawberry flavoured lip balm with a pearlescent pink tint made with real Strawberries. It is made from seven simple ingredients which are:

Pearlescent pink Mica colour
Strawberry flavour (made with real strawberries)
Virgin Organic Coconut Oil
Organic Apricot Kernal Oil
Organic Fairtrade Shea Butter,
Organic Yellow Beeswax
Organic Cocoa Butter
 
None of my lip balms have been tested on animals and are suitable for vegans/vegetarians.

name: Home made Organic Chocolate Lip Balm
description:
Hello everyone ♥

Chocoholics rejoice! This is chocolate flavoured lip balm with a brown tint which I had another recent request for. It's made with 6 simple ingredients which are: 

Virgin Organic coconut oil
Organic Apricot Kernel Oil
Organic Fairtrade Shea Butter
Organic Yellow Beeswax
Organic Cocoa Butter
Dutch pressed Cocoa (:

You may use it for special occasions either under lip gloss or lip stick or on its own. Either way it's sure to impress with its alluring chocolatey scent and moisturizing properties.

None of my lip balms have been tested on animals and are suitable for vegans/vegetarians.

I am legally allowed to sell my cosmetics as I received my licence to do so on the 22/06/2012

The packaging can even be re-cycled for those who care about the environment and I can take orders via email (anita_papita@hotmail.co.uk) but feel free to contact me through my group on Facebook called Mlle Nina if it's more convenient and to get regular updates:

http://www.facebook.com/MlleNina6

I also have a blog that I update regularly which you may follow:

http://lipbalmmenu.blogspot.co.uk/

Please expect your order to come in 3-5 business days and if you'd like a lip balm menu which has all of my lip balm flavours on it please feel free to contact me via email.
